casebody.data:
United Community Bank
v.
Wolfe, et al. 289PA15-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 13, 2016 Donald H. Barton, Attorney at Law, Brevard, for Wolfe, Thomas L., et al. Esther E. Manheimer, Attorney at Law, Robert Ashley Mays, Attorney at Law, Mark A. Pinkston, Attorney at Law, Asheville, for United Community Bank (Georgia). Clint S. Morse, Attorney at Law, Robert A. Singer, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for North Carolina Bankers Association.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 12th of September 2016 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of September 2016."

*803Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 3rd day of October 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
